name: RandoJumper
storyline: Your name is Johnny the Pirate and you have lost an arm and a leg. However, that does not stop you from proving that you can still JUMP!!! Due to your injuries your jumps are unstable but you must reach the top and become the RandoJumper!
summary: A precision platformer of a pirate who is out there to prove himself that he can reach the top!
